unnormalised: Hey! Ayurveda's always intrigued me. Heard good things about Panchakarma at Kerela Ayurveda Kendra, Kochi. My cousin, Priya, swears by it for her back pain. Says the Shirodhara treatment is divine! Thinking of trying it after Onam, maybe for a week. Anyone else experienced Ayurvedic bliss? Worth the cost (Rs. 5000 per day, approx.) and the travel (from Delhi, that's quite a few km!)? Should I pack extra ghee? ðŸ˜‰
normalised: Hey! Ayurveda is always intrigued me. Heard good things about Panchakarma at Kerala Ayurveda Kendra, Kochi. My cousin, Priya, swears by it for her back pain. Says the Shirodhara treatment is divine! Thinking of trying it after Onam, maybe for a week. Anyone else experienced Ayurvedic bliss? Worth the cost (rupee five thousand per day, approximately) and the travel (from Delhi, that is quite a few kilometer!)? Should I pack extra ghee?
